name: Wyvia: Prologue
description:
In this prologue to the game you fill the shoes of a fresh recruit of the Mercenaries. Get your footing in the land of Wyvia and begin to unravel the mystery of the where the Wyverns have gone. Your mission is simple, find the wyverns, uncover the source of the invasion, and discover your role in saving Wyvia.

Prologue Features

  • 2 open world areas
  • 11 locations
  • 4 classes
  • 2 bosses
  • 12 enemies
  • 21 accessories



Wyvia features fun and simple combat that feels good to utilize! Whack Goopies with a huge axe or fire away with screen clearing abilities!




Mix and match skills between 4 (11 in the full game) distinct classes, allocate points into stats and skills, and create a character that's really your own!




Explore a variety of locations from plains, deep caves, spooky forests, and frozen wastes as you struggle against the invasion of monsters in your world and find the source of their intrusion.




Use the power of Wyverns to fly, gain new abilities, augment your combat prowess and explore the world around you.
